==Interactables==
===Excerpt===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:Not only do we share the same [[Praetorian Golem|resilient skin]],
:But the same [[Essence of Pure Sacred Dewdrop|divine essence flows within our veins]].
:As there is [[Phobos|one wisdom, one melody]],
:So too are our wills one.
:Comrades,
:We are the hands and legs, the shield and sword,
:Roots and leaves, spring and stream.
:We should draw near to each other,
:Even unto outlanders must this be so.
:&nbsp;
:Copied from the "Song of Serenity," Movement 2, Stanza 84.
{{Dialogue End}}
